mapper.select: /*温度曲线：在日龄情况下；*/ SELECT (CASE WHEN a.growth_date > curdate() THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS dataflag, a.age AS data_age, a.growth_date AS data_date, concat(date_format(a.growth_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), '(', a.age, ')') AS x_axis, tData2.avgtempLeft1, tData2.avgtempLeft2, tData2.avgtempMiddle1, tData2.avgtempMiddle2, tData2.avgtempRight1, tData2.avgtempRight2, tData2.avgoutsidetemp, tData2.highAlarmTemp, tData2.lowAlarmTemp, tData2.insideSetTemp, tData2.insideHumidity FROM s_b_breed_detail a LEFT JOIN s_b_batch_curr sbbc ON sbbc.batch_id = a.batch_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT tData.timeId, truncate(avg(tData.inside_temp1), 1) AS avgtempLeft1, truncate(avg(tData.inside_temp2), 1) AS avgtempLeft2, truncate(avg(tData.inside_temp10), 1) AS avgtempMiddle1, truncate(avg(tData.inside_temp11), 1) AS avgtempMiddle2, truncate(avg(tData.inside_temp19), 1) AS avgtempRight1, truncate(avg(tData.inside_temp20), 1) AS avgtempRight2, truncate(AVG(tData.outside_temp), 1) AS avgoutsidetemp, truncate(AVG(tData.high_alarm_temp), 1) AS highAlarmTemp, truncate(AVG(tData.low_alarm_temp), 1) AS lowAlarmTemp, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_set_temp), 1) AS insideSetTemp, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_humidity), 1) AS insideHumidity FROM (SELECT date_format(collect_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS timeId, a.* FROM s_b_monitor_hist a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.house_id = ${HouseId} AND exists(SELECT 1 FROM s_b_batch_curr sbb WHERE sbb.batch_id = #{BreedBatchId} AND sbb.house_code = a.house_id ) ) tData GROUP BY tData.timeId ORDER BY tData.timeId ) AS tData2 ON tData2.timeId = date_format(a.growth_date, '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.growth_date BETWEEN date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 60 DAY) AND curdate() AND a.batch_id = #{BreedBatchId} AND a.house_code = ${HouseId};

/*在小时情况下*/ SELECT (CASE WHEN concat(tData3.data_date, ' ', sc.biz_code) > date_format(adddate(now(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS dataflag, sc.biz_code AS x_axis, ${HouseId} AS house_id, tData3.data_date AS data_date, concat('(日龄：', tData4.age, ')') AS data_age, tData2.avgtempLeft1, tData2.avgtempLeft2, tData2.avgtempMiddle1, tData2.avgtempMiddle2, tData2.avgtempRight1, tData2.avgtempRight2, tData2.avgoutsidetemp, tData2.highAlarmTemp, tData2.lowAlarmTemp, tData2.insideSetTemp, tData2.insideHumidity FROM s_d_code sc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN tData.timeId = '00:00' THEN '24:00' ELSE tData.timeId END AS timeId, tData.house_id, tData.date_age, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.inside_temp1), 1) AS avgtempLeft1, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.inside_temp2), 1) AS avgtempLeft2, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.inside_temp10), 1) AS avgtempMiddle1, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.inside_temp11), 1) AS avgtempMiddle2, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.inside_temp19), 1) AS avgtempRight1, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.inside_temp20), 1) AS avgtempRight2, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.outside_temp), 1) AS avgoutsidetemp, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.high_alarm_temp), 1) AS highAlarmTemp, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.low_alarm_temp), 1) AS lowAlarmTemp, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.inside_set_temp), 1) AS insideSetTemp, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.inside_humidity), 1) AS insideHumidity FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(collect_datetime, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '30' THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(collect_datetime, '%H'), ':30') ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(adddate(collect_datetime, INTERVAL 1 HOUR), '%H'), ':00') END) AS timeId, a.* FROM s_b_monitor_hist a WHERE a.house_id = ${HouseId} AND DATE_FORMAT(a.collect_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{DataRange} ) tData GROUP BY tData.timeId ORDER BY tData.timeId ) AS tData2 ON tData2.timeId = sc.biz_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT #{DataRange} AS data_date) AS tData3 ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN s_b_breed_detail tData4 ON date_format(tData4.growth_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = tData3.data_date AND tData4.batch_id = #{BreedBatchId} WHERE sc.code_type = 'HalfHour' ORDER BY x_axis

/*在分钟情况下*/ SELECT 'Y' AS dataflag, CONCAT(${Hour}, ':', CASE WHEN tData.timeId = '00' THEN '60' ELSE tData.timeId END) AS x_axis, 'Null' AS data_date, concat('(日龄：', tData2.age, ')') AS data_age, tData.house_id, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_temp1), 1) AS avgtempLeft1, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_temp2), 1) AS avgtempLeft2, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_temp10), 1) AS avgtempMiddle1, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_temp11), 1) AS avgtempMiddle2, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_temp19), 1) AS avgtempRight1, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_temp20), 1) AS avgtempRight2, truncate(AVG(tData.outside_temp), 1) AS avgoutsidetemp, truncate(AVG(tData.high_alarm_temp), 1) AS highAlarmTemp, truncate(AVG(tData.low_alarm_temp), 1) AS lowAlarmTemp, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_set_temp), 1) AS insideSetTemp, truncate(AVG(tData.inside_humidity), 1) AS insideHumidity FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(adddate(a.collect_datetime, INTERVAL 1 MINUTE), '%i') AS timeId, a.* FROM s_b_monitor_hist a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.house_id = ${HouseId} AND a.collect_datetime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{DataRangeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND a.collect_datetime < STR_TO_DATE(#{DataRangeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ) tData LEFT JOIN s_b_breed_detail tData2 ON date_format(tData2.growth_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(tData.collect_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AND tData2.batch_id = #{BreedBatchId} GROUP BY tData.timeId UNION ALL SELECT 'N' AS dataflag, CONCAT(${Hour}, ':', sc.biz_code) AS x_axis, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM s_d_code sc WHERE 1 = 1 AND sc.code_type = #{DataType} AND sc.biz_code > (SELECT right(concat('0', ifnull(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(sbh.collect_datetime), '%i') + 1, 0)), 2) FROM s_b_monitor_hist sbh WHERE 1 = 1 AND sbh.house_id = ${HouseId} AND sbh.collect_datetime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{DataRangeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{DataRangeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) ORDER BY x_axis;

/*温度曲线：在日龄情况下；*/ SELECT (CASE WHEN a.growth_date > curdate() THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS dataflag, a.age AS data_age, a.growth_date AS data_date, concat(date_format(a.growth_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), '(', a.age, ')') AS x_axis, tData2.co2, tData2.lux FROM s_b_breed_detail a LEFT JOIN s_b_batch_curr sbbc ON sbbc.batch_id = a.batch_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT tData.timeId, truncate(avg(tData.co2), 1) AS co2, truncate(avg(tData.lux), 1) AS lux FROM (SELECT date_format(collect_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS timeId, a.* FROM s_b_monitor_hist a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.house_id = ${HouseId} AND exists(SELECT 1 FROM s_b_batch_curr sbb WHERE sbb.batch_id = #{BreedBatchId} AND sbb.house_code = a.house_id ) ) tData GROUP BY tData.timeId ORDER BY tData.timeId ) AS tData2 ON tData2.timeId = date_format(a.growth_date, '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.growth_date BETWEEN date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 60 DAY) AND curdate() AND a.batch_id = #{BreedBatchId} AND a.house_code = ${HouseId};

/*在小时情况下*/ SELECT (CASE WHEN concat(tData3.data_date, ' ', sc.biz_code) > date_format(adddate(now(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS dataflag, sc.biz_code AS x_axis, ${HouseId} AS house_id, tData3.data_date AS data_date, concat('(日龄：', tData4.age, ')') AS data_age, tData2.co2, tData2.lux FROM s_d_code sc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN tData.timeId = '00:00' THEN '24:00' ELSE tData.timeId END AS timeId, tData.house_id, tData.date_age, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.co2), 1) AS co2, TRUNCATE(AVG(tData.lux), 1) AS lux FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(collect_datetime, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '30' THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(collect_datetime, '%H'), ':30') ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(adddate(collect_datetime, INTERVAL 1 HOUR), '%H'), ':00') END) AS timeId, a.* FROM s_b_monitor_hist a WHERE a.house_id = ${HouseId} AND DATE_FORMAT(a.collect_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{DataRange} ) tData GROUP BY tData.timeId ORDER BY tData.timeId ) AS tData2 ON tData2.timeId = sc.biz_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT #{DataRange} AS data_date) AS tData3 ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN s_b_breed_detail tData4 ON date_format(tData4.growth_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = tData3.data_date AND tData4.batch_id = #{BreedBatchId} WHERE sc.code_type = 'HalfHour' ORDER BY x_axis

SELECT 'Y' AS dataflag, CONCAT(${Hour}, ':', CASE WHEN tData.timeId = '00' THEN '60' ELSE tData.timeId END) AS x_axis, 'Null' AS data_date, concat('(日龄：', tData.date_age, ')') AS data_age, tData.house_id, truncate(AVG(tData.co2), 1) AS co2, truncate(AVG(tData.lux), 1) AS lux FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(adddate(a.collect_datetime, INTERVAL 1 MINUTE), '%i') AS timeId, a.* FROM s_b_monitor_hist a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.house_id = ${HouseId} AND a.collect_datetime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{DataRangeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND a.collect_datetime < STR_TO_DATE(#{DataRangeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ) tData GROUP BY tData.timeId UNION ALL SELECT 'N' AS dataflag, CONCAT(${Hour}, ':', sc.biz_code) AS x_axis, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM s_d_code sc WHERE 1 = 1 AND sc.code_type = #{DataType} AND sc.biz_code > (SELECT right(concat('0', ifnull(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(sbh.collect_datetime), '%i') + 1, 0)), 2) FROM s_b_monitor_hist sbh WHERE 1 = 1 AND sbh.house_id = ${HouseId} AND sbh.collect_datetime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{DataRangeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{DataRangeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) ORDER BY x_axis;
